attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Worst app I have ever gotten. I have unlimited data and it still sucked up all of it. When I finally opened the app it started attracting mosquitoes contaminated with syphilis, gonorrhea, chlamydia, trichomoniasis, HPV, Hepatitis B, chancroid, bacterial vaginosis, and pubic lice. See I never thought in a million years that it would be possible for a mosquito to have all of these diseases but this app made it possible. Putrid. People should be paid to download.

attributes.title: Worst app ever full of ads and spyware
attributes.review: This app not only was extremely slow to download but it was a complete invasion of privacy with way too many pop up ads. When you try to exit out of the ad it brings you to the advertisers website. This app was extremely annoying to get out of and continues to send unwanted emails to my inbox daily.
